title: Parma man seriously injured in accidental shooting
content:
A man was seriously injured in an accident shooting in Parma on Tuesday.
According to the Monroe County Sheriff's Department, a man in his 40s was working in a field "a few hundred yards behind his house when he was shot" on Moul Road around 4:45 p.m.
He was taken to Strong Memorial Hospital with serious injuries, said Sheriff's Office Cpl. John Helfer.
"It appears that someone who was target practicing may have accidentally shot the individual," Helfer.
Neither of the names were released. The investigation is ongoing.
WCLEVELAND@Gannett.com
